channel.title: Help finishing fight pits
channel.description: hey guys. I am making a fight pits, already added the heat vent, the score, the amount of tokool you get when you win. Now all i need to do is make it so that you dont lose items when you die, and so you spawn at the pits entrance when you die. Can someone help =(
